import {React,useEffect,useState} from 'react' import axios from "axios" function View() { const[products,setProducts]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:4000") .then((res) => { let items=res.data products.push(items) console.log(products) }) },[]) return (

{products.name}

) } export default View
